name: Pomegranate Lane
description: Pomegranate Lane is a narrow residential lane in Cassandra, quieter than the main streets and lightly trafficked. The lane feels enclosed and private, with few destinations and little reason for passersby to linger.

snapshot.name: Pomegranate Lane
snapshot.description: Pomegranate Lane is a short, subdued street bordered by closely spaced residential buildings. The atmosphere is muted and restrained, giving the impression of a place where residents prefer not to draw attention. The most notable feature of the lane is Adolf’s house, which stands out as the primary destination here.

conditions.description: Very little ambient noise; conversations and footsteps carry easily.
Limited lighting at night, with shadows pooling between buildings.

exits.description: A private residence belonging to Adolf, located directly along Pomegranate Lane and serving as the main point of interest on the street.
The lane opens back toward the surrounding streets of Cassandra.

snapshot.keeperNotes: Pomegranate Lane should feel intimate and exposed. Investigators visiting Adolf’s house are noticeable, and any activity here may quickly draw the attention of nearby residents.

connections.description: Pomegranate Lane primarily serves as access to Adolf’s residence.
